name: Abandoned
description: You wake up in a house, not knowing who or where you are or how you got there. First thing is to try and figure out how to get out. And while doing so...is what you are seeing real? Play to find out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.5ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 710 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1596 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core AMD FX Series 3.8ghz or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1050Ti or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1596 MB available space
